abstract: Microsoft Office has been around for more than 25 years, and today there are several ways to get the software — including free.
snippet: Microsoft Office has been around for more than 25 years, and today there are several ways to get the software — including free.
lead_paragraph: Q. I am confused by all the variations of the Microsoft Office programs offered these days. If I just want to use Excel (and maybe Word) on my PC, what’s the least expensive way to get it?
